title: [EVENTS - CRITICAL] Cannot Edit Event Contents

embed.description: Open to students and public! Tournament Type: Single Elimination, Best of 1 Map: Butcher's Bridge Game Mode: All Random All Mid (ARAM) Team Creation: Weighted random by even coordinator See event page for full details!

body:
First of all, there is a major time crunch here as the event is slated to take place in less than two weeks!

Now, I am trying to hold an event and when I submitted the event I included a link the google form to sign up however this link is not available anywhere from the main page.  I need to edit the contents of the event to include the sign up link however I cannot.  I press edit event, add what I need to add and then press save.  It tells me that everything has saved correctly but nothing has changed.  I understand a rioter has approve the changes but the changes do not even show on my edit or preview end and I have tried to change it several times over the past few days with no changes to either the public or private view of the event.
Event link: http://events.na.leagueoflegends.com/events/121959

I am having identical issues with this event: http://events.na.leagueoflegends.com/events/122261
However in addition this event is intended to be held on summoner's rift using the Black Market Brawlers game mode but the Rioter that approved it changed the map to Butcher's Bridge.

Thank you for the swift assistance.

replies.body: If anyone has suggestions it would be greatly appreciated!  I need to edit this event ASAP so it is correct for the tournament.  Thank!
